languages.text: "Я не вижу мятежников. Я вижу глупцов и грешников, по слабости отвергших закон Империума. Нуждающихся в покаянии и наставлении. Приди я сюда раньше, возможно, мне удалось бы предотвратить этот еретический бунт. А кого видишь ты, Вольный Торговец?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты задаешь не тот вопрос. Спроси лучше, почему я раньше не явился в этот гнойный нарыв на истерзанном теле Футфола? Кто знает, может, тогда я смог бы вскрыть его и заставить больше душ узреть собственную мерзость и раскаяться. Оглядись хорошенько, Вольный Торговец, вбери своим взором ересь и разврат, царящие здесь!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"
languages.original_text: "Я не вижу мятежников. Я вижу глупцов и грешников, по слабости отвергших закон Империума. Нуждающихся в покаянии и наставлении. Приди я сюда раньше, возможно, мне удалось бы предотвратить этот еретический бунт. А кого видишь ты, Вольный Торговец?"

traits.locale_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and sinners whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and sinners whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. traits.locale_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “在我看来，这些人并不是叛乱分子，只不过是愚者与恶棍。他们内心软弱，拒绝帝国的法律，他们需要的是忏悔与教导。如果我能早点来的话，或许我就能阻止这场异端叛乱了。在你看来，他们是什么样的人呢，行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，这些人并不是叛乱分子，只不过是愚者与恶棍。他们内心软弱，拒绝帝国的法律，他们需要的是忏悔与教导。如果我能早点来的话，或许我就能阻止这场异端叛乱了。在你看来，他们是什么样的人呢，行商浪人？”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「彼らは反逆者ではないようだな。そいつらは、己の弱さから帝国の法に反した愚か者や悪人だ。リペンタンスと教育が必要なのだ。もし今より早くここに辿り着いていれば、このような異端状況を防げたかもしれない。自由開拓者、お前はどう思う？」
languages.original_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは反逆者ではないようだな。そいつらは、己の弱さから帝国の法に反した愚か者や悪人だ。リペンタンスと教育が必要なのだ。もし今より早くここに辿り着いていれば、このような異端状況を防げたかもしれない。自由開拓者、お前はどう思う？」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Lo que veo no son rebeldes. Veo necios y malhechores cuya debilidad les hizo rechazar la ley del Imperium que necesitan arrepentimiento e instrucción. Si hubiera venido antes quizás hubiera podido evitar esta insurrección herética. ¿Y usted qué ve, Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: «Lo que veo no son rebeldes. Veo necios y malhechores cuya debilidad les hizo rechazar la ley del Imperium que necesitan arrepentimiento e instrucción. Si hubiera venido antes quizás hubiera podido evitar esta insurrección herética. ¿Y usted qué ve, Comerciante Independiente?».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich sehe keine Rebellen. Ich sehe Narren und Übeltäter, die ob ihrer Schwäche das Gesetz des Imperiums abgelehnt haben. Die Reue und Instruktion benötigen. Wäre ich früher hergekommen, vielleicht hätte ich diesen ketzerischen Aufstand verhindern können. Und was seht Ihr, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"
languages.original_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe keine Rebellen. Ich sehe Narren und Übeltäter, die ob ihrer Schwäche das Gesetz des Imperiums abgelehnt haben. Die Reue und Instruktion benötigen. Wäre ich früher hergekommen, vielleicht hätte ich diesen ketzerischen Aufstand verhindern können. Und was seht Ihr, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Pour moi, ce ne sont pas des rebelles. Je ne vois que des ignorants et des scélérats qui, par faiblesse, ont rejeté les lois de l'Imperium et qui ont besoin de repentir et d'instruction. Si j'étais venu plus tôt, j'aurais peut-être pu empêcher cette insurrection hérétique. Et vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, que voyez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour moi, ce ne sont pas des rebelles. Je ne vois que des ignorants et des scélérats qui, par faiblesse, ont rejeté les lois de l'Imperium et qui ont besoin de repentir et d'instruction. Si j'étais venu plus tôt, j'aurais peut-être pu empêcher cette insurrection hérétique. Et vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, que voyez-vous ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ben burada isyancı görmüyorum. Benim gördüğüm şey, zayıflıkları nedeniyle İmparatorluk kanunlarını reddeden aptallar ve suçlular. Tövbe etmeye ve yönlendirilmeye ihtiyaç duyan kimseler. Buraya daha önce gelseydim belki de bu kâfirce başkaldırıyı önleme şansım olabilirdi. Peki sen burada ne görüyorsun Hür Tacir?"
languages.original_text: "It is not rebels that I see. I see fools and malefactors whose weakness made them reject the law of the Imperium. Who are in need of repentance and instruction. Had I come here earlier, perhaps I would have been able to prevent this heretical insurrection. And what do you see, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben burada isyancı görmüyorum. Benim gördüğüm şey, zayıflıkları nedeniyle İmparatorluk'un kanunlarını reddeden aptallar ve suçlular. Tövbe etmeye ve yönlendirilmeye ihtiyaç duyan kişiler. Buraya daha önce gelseydim belki de bu kâfirce başkaldırıyı önleme şansım olabilirdi. Peki sen burada ne görüyorsun Hür Tacir?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
